My understanding at the moment (from having tried to implement this as a SessionRunHook) is that when using train_and_evaluate, which I believe is the canonical way to use an Estimator (and is how SageMaker does it), you cannot use a run_context.request_stop() call to actually stop training.

I know this is a larger issue with how train_and_evaluate works, but are there plans to be able to use any sort of Early Stopping hook w/in that framework?

Thanks!

body:
My understanding at the moment (from having tried to implement this as a SessionRunHook) is that when using `train_and_evaluate`, which I believe is the canonical way to use an Estimator (and is how SageMaker does it), you cannot use a `run_context.request_stop()` call to actually stop training.

I know this is a larger issue with how `train_and_evaluate` works, but are there plans to be able to use any sort of Early Stopping hook w/in that framework?

Thanks!
